page.title: 07Felkirk Middle School
page.content: In Felkirk Middle School there are about 340 children who range from 9 to 13 years.There are 18 staff including the headteacher and 14 rooms. The school opened in 1938 and now it's 47 years old.The heads name is Mr Lindley and he's been working in that school for 18 years. All the schools where the children come from are at Ryhill, Sth.Hiendley and Havercroft,which are all about 1 mile away from the school. Most of the children live 1 to 2 miles away from the school. The school goes to Royston baths every Monday morning. The school has got a playground and a massive field which has rabbits in.In the middle of the school there is a bird garden.
